channel.title: 部署 on Go 中文档集

item.title: 独立部署
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/deploy/beego/ Stand alone Deployment 独立部署 This will run application in the backend as a daemon. ​ 这将在后台以守护进程的形

item.title: 使用 Supervisord 进行部署
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/deploy/supervisor/ Deployment with Supervisord 使用 Supervisord 进行部署 Supervisord is a very useful process manager implemented in Python. Supervisord can change your non-daemon

item.title: 使用 Systemctl 部署
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/deploy/systemctl/ Deployment with Systemctl 使用 Systemctl 部署 Systemctl command is a command used to manage and control services. It allows you to enable, disable, view,

item.title: 使用 nginx 部署
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/deploy/nginx/ Deployment with nginx 使用 nginx 部署 Go already has a standalone http server. But we still want to have nginx to do more for us such as logging,

item.title: 使用 Apache 部署
item.description: 原文：https://beego.wiki/docs/deploy/apache/ Deployment with Apache 使用 Apache 部署 Apache is a web server and is set up to perform the same functions as nginx, serving as a reverse proxy
